actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exclusion for dividends and interest and to make such exclusion permanent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $500 ($1,000 in the case of a joint return) the amount of interest and dividend income which may be excluded from gross income. Amends the Crude Oil Windfall Profit Tax Act of 1980 to repeal the termination date for such exclusion.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exclusion for dividends and interest and to make such exclusion permanent.
